name: Keno Fairy
description:
Join the magic Keno Fairy in this addicting number guessing game. You guess between 2 and 10 numbers. Then the Keno Fairy draws 20 random numbers (balls) and you are rewarded for matches.

Plus, if you win a game and the last number drawn is one that you've marked, the Keno Fairy will award you up to 20 free games! Not only that, she'll make sure the first number drawn in these games is one that you've picked. (This girl is awesome!!!)

If you like other casino games like black jack, solitaire, video poker, texas hold'em or slot machines, then you'll want to add Keno Fairy to your collection.
